page.title: 04 Population.
page.content: The population in our area is not great, it covers mainly rural areas, with small farms and two parts of the villages of Bradford Peverell and Charminster. There is only a very small part of Dorchester which is included in our area .It includes two estates they are Victoria park and Poundbury estate. They have council houses built by the council, most of them are terraced and semi-detached. Lately many people have bought these houses as we have changed the law to encourage people to own their own homes. In 1983 Dorchester had a population of 14,185 ,Bradford Peverell has a pop. of 359 and Charminster has a pop. of 2,023.The villagers commute to work
